程序包的使用
org.springframework.security.oauth2.provider.approval

  • 使用org.springframework.security.oauth2.provider.approval的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.springframework.security.oauth2.config.annotation.web.configurers  
    org.springframework.security.oauth2.provider.approval  
    org.springframework.security.oauth2.provider.endpoint  
    org.springframework.security.oauth2.provider.token.store  
  • org.springframework.security.oauth2.config.annotation.web.configurers使用的org.springframework.security.oauth2.provider.approval中的类 
    类和说明
    ApprovalStore
    Interface for saving, retrieving and revoking user approvals (per client, per scope).
    UserApprovalHandler
    Basic interface for determining whether a given client authentication request has been approved by the current user.
  • org.springframework.security.oauth2.provider.approval使用的org.springframework.security.oauth2.provider.approval中的类 
    类和说明
    Approval 
    Approval.ApprovalStatus 
    ApprovalStore
    Interface for saving, retrieving and revoking user approvals (per client, per scope).
    UserApprovalHandler
    Basic interface for determining whether a given client authentication request has been approved by the current user.
  • org.springframework.security.oauth2.provider.endpoint使用的org.springframework.security.oauth2.provider.approval中的类 
    类和说明
    UserApprovalHandler
    Basic interface for determining whether a given client authentication request has been approved by the current user.
  • org.springframework.security.oauth2.provider.token.store使用的org.springframework.security.oauth2.provider.approval中的类 
    类和说明
    ApprovalStore
    Interface for saving, retrieving and revoking user approvals (per client, per scope).
